description:
Hi everybody !

Thank you to all those who attended the previous ACCU Bristol and Bath meetup. It was an excellent evening and thoroughly enjoyable - thanks.

Now that everyone is back from holiday, I thought it was time for another meetup, so I am please to announce an evening of Lightning Talks to be held on the 27th of October 2022 at the Blu Wireless Office (details below).

Lightning Talks are fun short presentations that range between 5 and 15 minutes. The talk can be based around anything that the presenter deems interesting for the audience. If you have an idea for a talk, then please email me a prospective title and a brief abstract.

Please note that this event (as with its predecessor) will be held at the [Blu Wireless Bristol Office](https://www.bluwireless.com/contact-us/) and not at the Marriott (though the Blu Wireless Office is literally next to the hotel). The address is as follows:

Blu Wireless
4th Floor
One Castlepark
Tower Hill
Bristol
BS2 0JA

The lightning talks will be followed by a trip to the Cornubia where the discussion will continue :-) !

Thanks and hope to see you there !

Jim
title: An Evening of Lightning Talks !
